ygData.subject: RE: [EverQuest] Ways to gain experience without fighting
ygData.msgSnippet: Hey it happens...I suggest you read the warrior section at www.everlore.com and see what race/warrior selection would be better (heh suggest you do this before
ygData.messageBody:
Hey it happens...I suggest you read the warrior section at www.everlore.com
and see what race/warrior selection would be better (heh suggest you do this
before you get the human/warrior higher


Sarakan ....Bertoxx

> -----Original Message-----
> From: Denis A. Baldwin [SMTP:dbaldwin@...]
> Sent: Wednesday, June 27, 2001 1:54 PM
> To: EverQuest@yahoogroups.com
> Subject: RE: [EverQuest] Ways to gain experience without fighting
>
> I am very new to this and the Warrior looked toughest :)
>
> I do like to fight, I was just curious as to what other options were
> available. The repetitive nature of "Melee, Kick, Melee, Kick" wears on
> one's soul.
>
> I am a human Warrior.
>
> Denis
